Replace.Text: Powerful Renaissance Era Naval Unit useful for controlling coasts. Heals Land Units nearby. Only Gustavus' Sweden can build it.

The Regal Ship is the Swedish unique unit, available only to Gustavus Adolphus. It replaces the Frigate and has a combat bonus in Coastal Terrain. Additionally, Land Units within two tiles of a Regal Ship will heal 10 extra damage each turn. Keep your Regal Ships near the coast where they will be of the most use to your land armies.

The Regal Ship is the Swedish unique unit, available only to Gustavus Adolphus. It replaces the Galleon and has a combat bonus when in Coastal Terrain. Additionally, Land Units within two tiles of the Regal Ship will heal 10 extra damage each turn. Keep your Regal Ships near the shoreline where they will be of the most use to your land armies.

The Regal Ship was the Swedish designation for her largest ships, used between 1615-1622, and then from 1633 until the 1670s. Perhaps the most famous example of a Regal Ship was the Vasa Warship, which was constructed on the orders of Gustavus Adolphus. Although the warship sunk on its maiden voyage in 1628, her recovery in 1961 has proven an invalueable source of insight into the naval techniques of 17th century Sweden.
Land Units within two tiles of this unit will [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]HEAL[ENDCOLOR] 10 damage each turn.

SWEDEN (GUSTAVUS ADOLPHUS)[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]UNIQUE UNIT: REGAL SHIP (FRIGATE/GALLEON)[NEWLINE]The Regal Ship is the Swedish unique unit, available only to Gustavus Adolphus. It replaces the Frigate and has a combat bonus in Coastal Terrain. Additionally, Land Units within two tiles of a Regal Ship will heal 10 extra damage each turn. Keep your Regal Ships near the coast where they will be of the most use to your land armies.
